%U A058896 274877906940,1099511627772,4398046511100,17592186044412,70368744177660,281474976710652,1125899906842620
%V A058896 -3,0,12,60,252,1020,4092,16380,65532,262140,1048572,4194300,16777212,
%W A058896 67108860,268435452,1073741820,4294967292,17179869180,68719476732,
%X A058896 274877906940,1099511627772,4398046511100,17592186044412,70368744177660,281474976710652,1125899906842620
%N A058896 a(n) = 4^n - 4.
%C A058896 a(n) = A000918(n)*A052548(n). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 14 2009
%H A058896 Harry J. Smith, <a href="/A058896/b058896.txt">Table of n, a(n) for n =0..500</a>
%F A058896 a(n) = A000302(n) - 4 = 4a(n-1) + 12 = 4*A024036(n-1) = 12*A002450(n-1).
%F A058896 G.f.: 3*(5x-1)/(1-x)/(1-4x).
%o A058896 (PARI) { f=1; for (n = 0, 500, write("b058896.txt", n, " ", f-4); f*=4; ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 23 2009

%K A058896 easy,sign
